scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n esbuild,flask,sync "npm run build:watch" "npm run flask:dev" "npm run sync"
scripts.sync: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:5000 --timeout 5000 && browser-sync start --proxy http://127.0.0.1:5000 --port 5001 --files "app/_templates/**/*.html, app/static/**/*" --open local
scripts.lint:fix: npm run ts:check && eslint app/static_src/js app/**/*.ts app/**/*.js --fix
